Movie.Title: Minority Report
Movie.Writer: Philip K. Dick (short story), Scott Frank (screenplay), Jon Cohen (screenplay)
Movie.Actors: Tom Cruise, Max von Sydow, Steve Harris, Neal McDonough
Movie.Plot: In a future where a special police unit is able to arrest murderers before they commit their crimes, an officer from that unit is himself accused of a future murder.
Movie.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 20 wins & 89 nominations.
